Name: acrobatic
Short: Dive over and under your foes.
Description: You may move through the tiles of hostile creatures, although you provoke an attack of opportunity when you do so. Attacks of opportunity against you are made with disadvantage when you have moved at least 10 feet in a straight line before triggering them.

Name: blind
Short: You are blind but can sense your surroundings.
Description: You can no longer see in the usual fashion. Instead, you gain an innate awareness of the 60 feet around you as if you could see in bright light. Normal challenges to vision such as darkness, fog, smoke or most sources of the blinded condition no longer affect you, although solid objects do. You cannot see at all beyond this radius.

Name: bloodthirsty
Short: Guaranteed critical hits after you drop a foe.
Description: Whenever you reduce a non-allied creature to below zero life, your critical hit threshold for all attacks is reduced to 1 until the end of your next turn.

Name: brash
Short: Charge at enemies and tackle them.
Description: Whenever you move 10 feet in a straight line and then hit a creature with a melee basic attack you automatically hit them a Shove attack as well.

Name: burly
Short: Carry off creatures better, even if they squirm.
Description: You have advantage on skill checks made to maintain a grapple. You may move at full speed when dragging a creature you have grappled.

Name: careful
Short: Avoid accidentally hurting your friends.
Description: Attacks that you make against allied creatures have disadvantage.

Name: chosen
Short: Once per rest gain a Resolve effect.
Description: Once per rest you may gain a benefit that would normally be earned by spending Resolve (other than to gain a rest).

Name: coolheaded
Short: Make ranged attacks under pressure.
Description: Being threatened no longer applies disadvantage to your ranged attacks.

Name: daring
Short: Parry your foes while only wielding a melee weapon in only one hand.
Description: When you are wielding a melee weapon in one hand and have nothing in your other hand, the die size of your Block reaction is increased once. In addition, while this is true, you may make a basic attack with your weapon against your attacker if they are in range whenever you use the Block reaction.

Name: darting
Short: Shift when you apply a boon.
Description: Whenever you apply a boon to another creature, you may move into an adjacent empty tile without provoking an attack of opportunity or spending movement. You only gain this benefit the first time each round that this triggers.

Name: deft
Short: Dash and Disengage at once.
Description: When you take the Dash minor action, also gain the effects of the Disengage minor action and vice versa.

Name: demure
Short: Hit creatures to get around or away from them.
Description: Whenever you hit a creature within attack, they do not threaten you until the start of your next turn.

Name: elusive
Short: Avoid attacks of opportunity completely when you Disengage.
Description: When you take the Disengage minor action, you do not trigger attacks of opportunity until the start of your next turn.

Name: encouraging
Short: Your target may shift when you apply a boon.
Description: Whenever you apply a boon to another creature, they may move into an adjacent empty tile without provoking an attack of opportunity or spending movement. You only gain this benefit the first time each round that this triggers.

Name: enduring
Short: Higher max essence.
Description: Your maximum essence is increased by 4 + your level.

Name: flexible
Short: Grapple with Agility.
Description: You may use Agility (Athletics) instead of Prowess  (Athletics) to maintain a grapple. You have advantage on all skill checks made to escape a grapple.

Name: hearty
Short: Remove two stacks of each condition every turn.
Description: Remove two stacks of each condition from yourself at the end of each of your turns, rather than the usual one.

Name: resolute
Short: You are immune to forced movement.
Description: You are immune to forced movement.

Name: lithe
Short: Hide easily and move quickly while hidden.
Description: You may attempt to Hide when only obscured by a single effect. You may move at full speed while stealthed without suffering disadvantage on Stealth checks.

Name: lucky
Short: Reroll 1s when attacking.
Description: Whenever you roll a 1 on an attack roll, reroll the attack. You must use the new result.

Name: merciless
Short: Double down on conditions.
Description: Whenever you apply at least one stack of a condition to a creature that already has a stack of that same condition, apply an additional stack of that condition.

Name: nimble
Short: You are unusually fast when you Dash.
Description: Your Dash minor action now grants you additional movement speed equal to your movement speed, rather than half of it.

Name: nocturnal
Short: See in the dark.
Description: Objects in dim light are no longer obscured, and objects in darkness are now merely obscured, rather than invisible.

Name: obstinate
Short: Lash out at creatures who try to walk around you.
Description: Whenever a creature moves into a tile you are threatening while already threatened by you, you may make an attack of opportunity against them.

Name: opportunistic
Short: Advantage on attacks of opportunity.
Description: You have advantage on attacks of opportunity.

Name: pragmatic
Short: Advantage on Shove and Expose attacks.
Description: You have advantage on Shove and Expose attacks.

Name: prepared
Short: Attune to twice as much gear.
Description: You can now attune to two different sets of armor and four different sets of arms so long as each set has an enchantment point total less than your aptitude bonus. Like always, you can only benefit from one set of armor at a time and need to physically change what you are wearing to swap the benefits.

Name: audacious
Short: Crit more often, but sometimes your attacks backfire.
Description: The critical hit threshold for your attacks is reduced by three. Whenever you roll a 1 while making an attack, something goes horribly wrong, and you suffer the attackâ€™s effects instead.

Name: resilient
Short: Training in a special defense and a resistance.
Description: You are trained in a special defense of your choice. Gain resistance to a damage type of your choice other than physical.

Name: resourceful
Short: Learn more powers.
Description: Learn two additional powers from your class. If you are a Shaman, learn one new manifestation instead. If you are a Touched, gain another deviance instead.

Name: responsive
Short: Use your reaction to apply boons when your allies are struck.
Description: After another allied creature within 10 feet of you is hit by an attack, you may take the First Aid reaction. You may use any major or minor action at this time, so long as it applies a boon to them.

Name: rough
Short: Flip creatures over your head.
Description: When you hit a creature with a Shove attack, you may choose to push them into any empty tile that is adjacent to you, rather than a tile within 5 feet of their previous position.

Name: sadistic
Short: Apply an extra stack of afflictions.
Description: Whenever you apply at least one stack of an affliction, apply another stack of that same affliction.

Name: seasoned
Short: Swap better weapons faster.
Description: You may equip sets of weaponry with a gear point total one higher than your Prowess. You may swap between sets of arms using only a single minor action. If at least one of your weapons has the swapping affix, you may swap between sets of arms whenever you make a basic attack.

Name: sharp
Short: Threaten foes at range.
Description: Your threat radius is always equal to your weapon's range. Creatures no longer have disadvantage on ranged attacks due to being threatened by you.

Name: shifty
Short: Shift after using your reaction.
Description: Whenever you use your reaction, you may move into an adjacent empty tile without provoking an attack of opportunity or spending movement.

Name: skilled
Short: Learn a new skill.
Description: You are trained in an additional skill.

Name: cagey
Short: Shift at the start of your turn if threatened.
Description: At the start of your turn, if you are threatened by another creature, you may move into an adjacent empty tile without provoking an attack of opportunity or spending movement.

Name: sneaky
Short: Stay hidden when you miss.
Description: When you miss a creature with an attack while stealthed, you remain hidden and any invisibility you may have is not broken if it normally would be.

Name: spry
Short: Somersault over your foes in melee.
Description: After you make a melee attack against a creature, you may spend 5 feet of movement to move to any empty tile that is the same distance as you currently are from them. This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

Name: stable
Short: Ignore your enemies' crits and your own.
Description: You are immune to the effects of critical hits. You no longer benefit from critical hits.

Name: steadfast
Short: Stand still to Defend faster.
Description: If you have not yet spent movement on your turn, you may take the Defend major action as a minor action. If you do so, you may not spend movement until the start of your next turn.

Name: blowhard
Short: Stand still to aim.
Description: Whenever you make an attack on your turn and have not spent movement yet this turn, you may choose to gain advantage on that attack. If you do, you may not spend movement until the start of your next turn.

Name: rugged
Short: Better armor and shields.
Description: You may equip sets of armor with a gear point total one higher than your Prowess. The die size of your Block reaction is increased once.

Name: supportive
Short: Your boons grant extra absorption.
Description: Whenever you apply a boon to another creature, they gain 4 absorption. You only gain this benefit the first time each round that this triggers.

Name: testy
Short: Lash out at creatures that get close.
Description: Whenever a non-allied creature enters the area you are threatening you may make an attack of opportunity against them.

Name: thrifty
Short: Conserve your consumables and use them agressively.
Description: Whenever you use a consumable, roll a d20. On an 11 or higher, it is not used up. You have advantage on Focus (Artifice) skill checks made to avoid exhaustion from overusing consumable magic items.

Name: unrelenting
Short: Stay conscious while dying.
Description: You no longer fall unconscious due to dropping below zero life.

Name: unstoppable
Short: Stand still to knock creatures back further.
Description: Whenever you make an attack on your turn and have not spent movement yet this turn, you may choose to cause all forced movement that you apply with that attack to be doubled. If you do, you may not spend movement until the start of your next turn.

Name: upbeat
Short: Remove three stacks of afflictions every turn.
Description: Remove three stacks of afflictions from yourself at the end of each of your turns, rather than the usual one.

Name: vengeful
Short: Focus down creatures who hit you.
Description: Whenever you are hit by an attack, you have advantage on attacks made against the creature that hit you until the end of your next turn. You only have advantage on attacks made against the most recent creature that hit you.

Name: vigilant
Short: Block attacks for your allies with a superior shield.
Description: You may use your Block reaction to absorb damage from attacks against any creature within 5 feet of you. The die size of your Block reaction is increased once.

Name: volatile
Short: Crit more often.
Description: The critical hit threshold of your attacks is reduced by two.

Name: wild
Short: Better natural weapons and optional natural armor.
Description: Your body is an effective weapon all on its own. Build a mundane set of arms with a gear score equal to your Prowess plus two that you have access to at all times. It gains the free hands and attached properties but cannot have the ranged or thrown properties. When creating enchanted arms, you may choose to modify these arms instead, creating for example magical tattoos or claw covers, rather than an enchanted sword. If your Prowess changes, you must also modify these arms. You may also build a mundane set of armor in this way. If you do, gain its benefit at all times. It cannot be unequipped and you cannot equip other armor.
